metadata.title: CVE-2022-0801 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in HTML parser in Google Chrome prior to99.0.4844.51 allowed a remote attacker to bypass XSS preventions via acrafted HTML page. (Chrome security severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
